meanings.definition: excessively refined or elegant in manner or taste
meanings.sent1: The overrefined lady always wore fancy dresses and spoke in a posh way.
meanings.sent2: Her overrefined taste in art led her to collect only the most expensive paintings.
meanings.sent3: The overrefined gentleman insisted on using a golden spoon to eat his cereal.
meanings.sent4: Her overrefined manners were like delicate lace, beautiful but fragile.
meanings.sent5: The overrefined decorations at the party made it feel like a royal ball.

meanings.sent1: The cake was so overrefined with decorations that it looked more like a sculpture.
meanings.sent2: His overrefined speech made it hard for others to understand him.
meanings.sent3: The overrefined garden had perfectly trimmed bushes in intricate shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her overrefined sense of style made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The overrefined perfume was so strong that it gave everyone a headache.

meanings.sent1: The overrefined furniture in the room made it feel unwelcoming and cold.
meanings.sent2: The overrefined dish was so fancy that no one knew how to eat it.
meanings.sent3: His overrefined manners at the party made everyone feel underdressed.
meanings.sent4: The overrefined music playing in the background created a sophisticated atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The overrefined language used in the book made it difficult for children to understand.
